name: Timeline controller
description: Control timelines from event sheets, such as starting and stopping them.

params.name: Type
params.description: The timeline state when this trigger runs.

conditions.name: Is any playing
conditions.description: Test if any timeline is currently playing.

conditions.name: On keyframe reached
conditions.description: Triggered when a master keyframe with specific tags has been reached during timeline playback.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Space-separated tags to check for to determine if a master keyframe has been reached.

params.name: Match
params.description: Whether to match if the keyframe has any of the tags or all of the tags.

conditions.name: On any keyframe reached
conditions.description: Triggered when any master keyframe has been reached during timeline playback.

conditions.name: On started
conditions.description: Triggered when a specific timeline starts.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Timeline tags to check for.

params.name: Type
params.description: The timeline state when this trigger runs.

conditions.name: On finished
conditions.description: Triggered when a specific timeline finishes.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Timeline tags to check for.

conditions.name: Is playing
conditions.description: Test if a specific timeline is currently playing.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Timeline tags to check for.

conditions.name: On time set
conditions.description: Triggered when the playback time of a specific timeline has been changed.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Timeline tags to check for.

conditions.name: Is paused
conditions.description: Test if a timeline is currently paused.

params.name: Timeline
params.description: The timeline to check.

conditions.name: Is paused (by name)
conditions.description: Test if a timeline is currently paused, using a string of the timeline name.

params.name: Name
params.description: Name of the timeline to check.

conditions.name: Is paused
conditions.description: Test if a specific timeline is currently paused.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Timeline tags to check for.

conditions.name: Is any paused
conditions.description: Test if any timeline is currently paused.

params.name: Timeline
params.description: The timeline to start playing.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Optional space separated list of tags to identify a timeline later on.

actions.name: Play (by name)
actions.description: Play a timeline, using a string to select it.

params.name: Name
params.description: The name of the timeline to start playing.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Optional space separated list of tags to identify a timeline later on.

actions.name: Play all
actions.description: Play all timelines which are not already playing.

actions.name: Set instance
actions.description: Set an instance to use in the next timeline playback.
actions.display_text: Set [b]{0}[/b] to track [b]{1}[/b] of the next timeline

params.name: Object to set
params.description: The object to set to the next timeline played.

params.name: Track ID
params.description: The ID of the track to set the instance to. If empty, the instance will be set to the first track found, which hasn't been previously set.

actions.name: Pause
actions.description: Pause all timelines with the specified tags.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Space separated list of timeline tags to change.

actions.name: Resume
actions.description: Resume all timelines with the specified tags.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Space separated list of timeline tags to change.

actions.name: Stop
actions.description: Stop all timelines with the specified tags.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Space separated list of timeline tags to change.

actions.name: Set time
actions.description: Set the time of all timelines with the specified tags.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Space separated list of tags to find timelines with.

params.name: Time
params.description: The time to set in seconds, or a string with a keyframe's tags, to set the time to the first keyframe that matches all the tags.

actions.name: Set playback rate
actions.description: Set the playback rate of all timelines with the specified tags.

params.name: Tags
params.description: Space separated list of timeline tags to change.

params.name: Rate
params.description: The rate to set, 1 being normal speed, 0.5 half speed, etc. Negative values produce backwards playback.

actions.name: Unset instances
actions.description: Unset all previously set instances for the next timeline.

expressions.name: Time
expressions.description: The current playback time of a timeline in seconds.

params.name: TimelineNameOrTags
params.description: Name or tags of the timeline to get the time from.

expressions.name: Progress
expressions.description: The current playback progress of a timeline in the range 0-1.

params.name: TimelineNameOrTags
params.description: Name or tags of the timeline to get the progress for.

expressions.name: KeyframeTags
expressions.description: In a trigger, the tags of the relevant keyframe.

expressions.name: TimelineName
expressions.description: In a trigger, the name of the relevant timeline.

expressions.name: TotalTime
expressions.description: The total playing time of a timeline in seconds.

params.name: TimelineNameOrTags
params.description: Name or tags of the timeline to get the total time from.

expressions.name: TimelineTags
expressions.description: In a trigger, the tags of the relevant timeline.

expressions.name: Value
expressions.description: The value of a value track in the specified timeline

params.name: TimelineNameOrTags
params.description: Name or tags of the timeline that has the value track.

params.name: ValueTrackNameOrId
params.description: Name or id of the track to get the value for.

expressions.name: Ease
expressions.description: Get the value of an easing function.

params.name: Name
params.description: The name of a built-in or custom ease.

params.name: Value
params.description: A value in the range 0-1.

expressions.name: KeyframeTime
expressions.description: Get the time of a keyframe in the specified timeline.

params.name: TimelineNameOrTags
params.description: Name or tags of the timeline the keyframe is in.

params.name: KeyframeTags
params.description: Tags of the keyframe to get the time of.
